title: Parental behaviour of fish
creator_credit: Cheryl Houben, Michael Sullivan and University of Melbourne
brief_description: Shows patterns of breeding and parental care in ciclid fish and encourages the use of aquaria in animal behaviour studies in schools. The first part compares the behaviour of two central American species; the second part presents the strikingly different parental care of an African ciclid.
